entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

entity.name: South Korea slams Japan's decision to quarantine visitors from the country as 'unreasonable'
entity.description: South Korea protested a decision by Japan to quarantine arrivals from the country for two weeks at designated sites, calling it "unreasonable, excessive and extremely regrettable." There are currently more than 6,200 cases of COVID–19 in South Korea.

text:
Have a support system in place for elderly family members.
What if I’m traveling?
The C.D.C. has advised against all non-essential travel to South Korea, China, Italy and Iran. And the agency has warned older and at-risk travelers to avoid Japan.
